languages.text: "Воистину, эти ваши бумажки убийственнее тысячи кинжалов. Будь в руках ткачей писчие перья, Простор бы утонул в крови".
"By the Undying Emperor, your papers are more lethal than a thousand blades. Were the spinners to arm themselves with quills, the Expanse would drown in blood."
languages.original_text: "Воистину, эти ваши бумажки убийственнее тысячи кинжалов. Будь в руках ткачей писчие перья, Простор бы утонул в крови".

traits.locale_text: "By the Undying Emperor, your papers are more lethal than a thousand blades. Were the spinners to arm themselves with quills, the Expanse would drown in blood."
"By the Undying Emperor, your papers are more lethal than a thousand blades. Were the spinners to arm themselves with quills, the Expanse would drown in blood."
"By the Undying Emperor, your papers are more lethal than a thousand blades. Were the spinners to arm themselves with quills, the Expanse would drown in blood."

"By the Undying Emperor, your papers are more lethal than a thousand blades. Were the spinners to arm themselves with quills, the Expanse would drown in blood."
"By the Undying Emperor, your papers are more lethal than a thousand blades. Were the spinners to arm themselves with quills, the Expanse would drown in blood."

languages.text: «Por el Emperador Inmortal, esos papeles son más letales que mil hojas. Si los tejedores blandieran plumas, la Extensión se ahogaría en sangre».
languages.original_text: "By the Undying Emperor, your papers are more lethal than a thousand blades. Were the spinners to arm themselves with quills, the Expanse would drown in blood."

traits.locale_text: «Por el Emperador Inmortal, esos papeles son más letales que mil hojas. Si los tejedores blandieran plumas, la Extensión se ahogaría en sangre».

languages.text: 「不死の皇帝に誓って、その論文は千の刃物よりも致命的なものです。織り手が羽ペンで武装すれば、エクスパンスは血に溺れるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "By the Undying Emperor, your papers are more lethal than a thousand blades. Were the spinners to arm themselves with quills, the Expanse would drown in blood."

traits.locale_text: 「不死の皇帝に誓って、その論文は千の刃物よりも致命的なものです。織り手が羽ペンで武装すれば、エクスパンスは血に溺れるでしょう」

languages.text: “以不死神皇之名，你的文件比一千把利刃更加致命。如果织网者手中也都拿着这样的羽毛笔，那整个科罗努斯扩区都会被鲜血吞没。”
languages.original_text: "By the Undying Emperor, your papers are more lethal than a thousand blades. Were the spinners to arm themselves with quills, the Expanse would drown in blood."

traits.locale_text: “以不死神皇之名，你的文件比一千把利刃更加致命。如果织网者手中也都拿着这样的羽毛笔，那整个科罗努斯扩区都会被鲜血吞没。”

languages.text: "Beim Todlosen Imperator, Eure Papiere sind tödlicher als tausend Klingen. Würden die Spinner sich mit Schreibfedern bewaffnen, die Ausdehnung würde in Blut ertrinken."
languages.original_text: "By the Undying Emperor, your papers are more lethal than a thousand blades. Were the spinners to arm themselves with quills, the Expanse would drown in blood."

traits.locale_text: "Beim Todlosen Imperator, Eure Papiere sind tödlicher als tausend Klingen. Würden die Spinner sich mit Schreibfedern bewaffnen, die Ausdehnung würde in Blut ertrinken."

languages.text: « Au nom de l'Immortel, votre paperasse est plus mortifère qu'un millier de lames réunies. Si les tisseurs s'armaient de plumes, les Étendues se noieraient dans leur propre sang. »
languages.original_text: "By the Undying Emperor, your papers are more lethal than a thousand blades. Were the spinners to arm themselves with quills, the Expanse would drown in blood."

traits.locale_text: « Au nom de l'Immortel, votre paperasse est plus mortifère qu'un millier de lames réunies. Si les tisseurs s'armaient de plumes, les Étendues se noieraient dans leur propre sang. »

languages.text: "Ölmeyen İmparator adına, kâğıtlarınız binlerce kılıçtan bile daha ölümcül. Olur da dokurlar, silah niyetine tüy kalem kuşanırlarsa Enginlik kana boğulur."
languages.original_text: "By the Undying Emperor, your papers are more lethal than a thousand blades. Were the spinners to arm themselves with quills, the Expanse would drown in blood."
